methods.name: Serialize
methods.comment: Begin UObject interface

methods.name: PreSaveGame_Implementation
methods.comment: Begin IFGSaveInterface

methods.name: FinishRestartPlayer
methods.comment: Begin AFGGameModeBase interface

methods.name: PostActorsInitialized
methods.comment: All actors initialized, notify the save system

methods.name: GetCurrentOptions
methods.comment: Get the current options we started the map with

methods.name: GenerateNextAutosaveId
methods.comment: Generate the next autosave id

methods.name: GetSaveSessionName
methods.comment: Get the session id of our current session

methods.name: SetSaveSessionName
methods.comment: Set the session id of our current session

methods.name: GetSaveSession
methods.comment: Get the save system

methods.name: GetDayLength
methods.comment: Get the length of the day parsed from the game options

methods.name: GetNightLength
methods.comment: Get the length of the night parsed from the game options

methods.name: IsMainMenuGameMode
methods.comment: Does this Game Mode function specifically as the main menu?

methods.name: ShouldSetupSave
methods.comment: Returns true if we should setup save for this gamemode

methods.name: GetDefaultPlayerCapsuleSize
methods.comment:
@param out_capsuleRadius - half height capsule
@return false if there is no default player class

methods.name: Debug_SetStartingPoint
methods.comment: Debugging stuffs

methods.name: RebootSession
methods.comment: Saves the game, and then restarts from the load

methods.name: SetServerRestartWorldTime
methods.comment: Set the desired world time we want to restart the server

methods.name: TriggerWorldSave
methods.comment: Trigger a save to save the world

methods.name: TriggerBundledWorldSave
methods.comment: Trigger a save to save the world

methods.name: IsValidPawnToReclaim
methods.comment:
If return true, then this is a pawn that we can take control of during spawning, else it's not valid
for some reason (dead maybe)

methods.name: GetRestartSessionSaveName
methods.comment: Get the name of the save that we want to create when rebooting the session due to long server uptimes

methods.name: BuildRestartSessionURL
methods.comment: Build the URL for restarting the session

methods.name: CachePlayerStarts
methods.comment:
Caches the player starts by PlayerStartTag as the key.
@return Play from here player start, if found; otherwise nullptr.

properties.name: StartLocationOption
properties.comment: Name of the start location option that is parsed

properties.name: LoadGameOption
properties.comment: Name of the load game option that is parsed

properties.name: mFromLoadGame
properties.comment: If true, then this game should be started from a load game

properties.name: mOptions
properties.comment: Options this game was started with

properties.name: mSessionId_DEPRECATED
properties.comment: The save session (should actually be SaveSessionId

properties.name: mSessionIDString_DEPRECATED
properties.comment: The name of the session we are playing, migrated over to mSaveSessionName

properties.name: mSaveSessionName
properties.comment: The name of the session we are playing

properties.name: mDayLength
properties.comment: In minutes, how long is the daytime

properties.name: mNightLength
properties.comment: In minutes, how long is the nighttime

properties.name: mDebugStartingPointTagName
properties.comment: Overriding selected starting point when respawning.

properties.name: mDefaultRemoteCallObjectsClassNames
properties.comment: Config property to reference remote call objects for player controllers

properties.name: mRemoteCallObjectsClassNames
properties.comment: These are the default Remote Call Objects for this PlayerController

properties.name: mServerRestartTimeHours
properties.comment: After how many hours should the server restart itself

properties.name: mSkipTutorialInPIE
properties.comment: Skips the tutorial step if we play in PIE
